title: Strictly viewers devastated as spoiler leaks announcing surprise exit
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly fans are calling for metaphorical murder on the dance floor after the results of tonight's show leaked - again.

And, although the Mirror Online is not repeated the shock exit, the names have left fans devastated.

Because Strictly is filmed over one evening often the spoilers are leaked on social media, with fans searching for gossip using the Strictly hashtag stumbling across the result.

And this week's is the most shocking yet.

It comes as viewers have expressed their anger after Will Bayley received a bye to next week.

(Image: BBC)

The Paralympic star was given a pass after he was forced to pull out of Halloween week on doctor's orders.

Will, who is partnered with Janette Manara, did not perform after fearing he had broken his legs during an awkward jump down from a table in rehearsals.

Presenter Tess Daly announced that under the Strictly rules, at this stage of the competition, Will would go straight through to next week.

However, Alex Scott was not given a bye despite having to dance with new partner Kevin Clifton following Neil Jones' last-minute injury.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Strictly Come Dancing fans took to Twitter to protest against the 'unfair' decision.

One viewer asked: "Why was Will granted a bye through to next week and Alex wasn’t? Unfair to me"

"Tess say “According to the rules of #strictly, Will gets a bye...”. Where do we see these rules then?," added another.

A third said: "Alex should get a bye into next week as well."

"Personally think they should have given Alex a bye as well," said a fourth.
description: Strictly fans were left devastated as the result of tonight's show was leaked online
